description:
Finally, the day has arrived where Luffy`s face is on an authentic wanted poster! Now there are enemies in hot pursuit as the crew makes waves for Logue Town - final resting place of Gold Roger!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bounty! Straw Hat Luffy Becomes Known to the World!
Joukinkubi! Mugiwara no Luffy Yo ni Shirewataru
La tête mise à prix ! Luffy au chapeau de paille devient une célébrité mondiale !
Награда за голову! Луффи Соломенная шляпа приобретает мировую известность
ค่าหัว! ลูฟี่โด่งดังแล้ว!
賞金首! 麦わらのルフィ世に知れ渡る
